lead_paragraph: FINSIE--Geraldine Bohrod, 86. Beloved daughter, wife, mother and grandmother. Predeceased by her husband Sherwin. Beloved mother of Marita Altman (Michael) and Brian Finsie (Cynthia), and adored grandmother of Samantha Gardner (Evan), Theodore Altman, Leah Finsie and James Finsie. Donations may be made to the Hebrew Home at Riverdale and the Metropolitan Opera. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FINSIE, GERALDINE BOHROD
